akn:section.akn:heading: Rights and duties of attorney in fact.

akn:content.akn:p: Subject to any express limitations in the durable power of attorney for health care, an attorney in fact shall have all the rights, powers and authority related to health-care decisions that the principal would have under District and federal law.
